cn.com.sinosure.mq.consumer

类 ConsumerContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.com.sinosure.mq.consumer.ConsumerContainer

  • public class ConsumerContainer
extends Object
    A consumer container hosts consumers and manages their lifecycle.
    作者:
    christian.bick, uwe.janner, soner.dastan

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ConsumerContainer.ConsumerHolder
      A holder of a consumer attaching additional state to the consumer.
      static class  ConsumerContainer.ManagedConsumer 
      protected class  ConsumerContainer.SingleConnectionListener
      A container connection listener to react on events of a SingleConnectionFactory if used.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ConsumerContainer()
      Creates the container using the given connection factory (re-)establish the connection to the broker.

        public ConsumerContainer()
        Creates the container using the given connection factory (re-)establish the connection to the broker.
        参数:
        connectionFactory - The connection factory

      • startAllConsumers

        public void startAllConsumers()
                       throws IOException

        Starts all consumers managed by the container.

        A started consumer consumes from the broker and is re-registered at the broker after a connection was lost and reestablished afterwards.

        抛出:
        IOException

      • stopAllConsumers

        public void stopAllConsumers()

        Stops all consumers managed by the container.

        A stopped consumer does not consume from the broker

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the container, stopping all consumers and removing them from the container.

      • getEnabledConsumers

        public List<ConsumerContainer.ConsumerHolder> getEnabledConsumers()

        Gets all enabled consumers managed by the container.

        Enabled consumers have been started once and not been stopped since that. An enabled consumer is (re-)registered by the container on connection (re-)establishing.

        返回:
        The list of enabled consumers

      • getDisabledConsumers

        public List<ConsumerContainer.ConsumerHolder> getDisabledConsumers()

        Gets all disabled consumers managed by the container.

        Disabled consumers have either never been started or have been stopped at some time and not been started again.

        返回:
        The list of disabled consumers.
        另请参阅:
        #getEnabledConsumers()}

      • getActiveConsumers

        public List<ConsumerContainer.ConsumerHolder> getActiveConsumers()

        Gets all active consumers managed by the container

        Active consumers must are also enabled consumers and are currently consuming from the broker. This means they have an active channel via an open connection to the broker and are registered at the broker.

        Note: This method is only for use of information as it is not exact in terms of concurrency and time.

        返回:
        The list of active consumers

      • getInactiveConsumers

        public List<ConsumerContainer.ConsumerHolder> getInactiveConsumers()
        Gets all inactive consumers managed by the container

        Inactive consumers may also be disabled consumers and are currently not consuming from the broker. In case a consumer is disabled this is an expected state. In case the consumer is enabled, the reason for the consumers inactivity is either a channel problem, a loss of connection or an unfinished registration at the broker.

        Note: This method is only for use of information as it is not exact in terms of concurrency and time.

        返回:
        The list of inactive consumers

      • filterConsumersForClass

        protected List<ConsumerContainer.ConsumerHolder> filterConsumersForClass(Class<? extends com.rabbitmq.client.Consumer> consumerClass)
        Filters the consumers being an instance, extending or implementing the given class from the list of managed consumers.
        参数:
        consumerClass - The consumer class
        返回:
        The filtered consumers

      • filterConsumersForEnabledFlag

        protected List<ConsumerContainer.ConsumerHolder> filterConsumersForEnabledFlag(boolean enabled,
                                                                   MQEnum type)
        Filters the consumers matching the given enabled flag from the list of managed consumers.
        参数:
        enabled - Whether to filter for enabled or disabled consumers
        返回:
        The filtered consumers

      • filterConsumersForActiveFlag

        protected List<ConsumerContainer.ConsumerHolder> filterConsumersForActiveFlag(boolean active)
        Filters the consumers matching the given active flag from the list of managed consumers.
        参数:
        active - Whether to filter for active or inactive consumers
        返回:
        The filtered consumers

      • enableConsumers

        protected void enableConsumers(List<ConsumerContainer.ConsumerHolder> consumerHolders)
                        throws IOException
        Enables all consumers in the given list and hands them over for activation afterwards.
        参数:
        consumerHolders - The consumers to enable
        抛出:
        IOException - if the activation process fails for a consumer

      • disableConsumers

        protected void disableConsumers(List<ConsumerContainer.ConsumerHolder> consumerHolders)
        Disables all consumers in the given list after deactivating them.
        参数:
        consumerHolders - The consumers to disable

      • activateConsumers

        protected void activateConsumers(List<ConsumerContainer.ConsumerHolder> consumerHolders)
                          throws IOException
        Activates all consumers in the given list.
        参数:
        consumerHolders - The list of consumers to activate
        抛出:
        IOException - if the activation process fails for a consumer

      • deactivateConsumers

        protected void deactivateConsumers(List<ConsumerContainer.ConsumerHolder> consumerHolders)
        Deactivates all consumers in the given list.
        参数:
        consumerHolders - The list of consumers to deactivate.

      • checkPreconditions

        protected void checkPreconditions(List<ConsumerContainer.ConsumerHolder> consumerHolders)
                           throws IOException
        Checks if all preconditions are fulfilled on the broker to successfully register a consumer there. One important precondition is the existence of the queue the consumer shall consume from.
        参数:
        consumerHolders - The consumer holders
        抛出:
        IOException - if the precondition check fails

      • createChannel

        protected com.rabbitmq.client.Channel createChannel(MQEnum businessType)
                                             throws IOException
        Creates a channel to be used for consuming from the broker.
        返回:
        The channel
        抛出:
        IOException - if the channel cannot be created due to a connection problem
